author: Charlie Spiering, Charlie Spiering
title: Donald Trump: GPS Tracking for Coronavirus 'A Bit Severe'; National Stay at Home Order Unlikely
description: "The GPS, that's a severe idea," Trump said. "I've been hearing about it. What happens? A siren goes off if you are too close to somebody?"
content:
President Donald Trump reassured Americans on Monday at the White House that he was not seriously considering dramatic government controls over their lives as the country continues fighting the spread of the coronavirus.
